paragraphs.content: This Fossil Chrono Bracelet Mens Watch is ideal for adding a smart finish to your outfit.The gleaming silver strap has a classic linked design, lending this watch a timeless feel. This blends seamlessly with the sleek silver bezel that frames the deep black watch face to create a strong look.The white accents across the watch face have a great contemporary feel. The chronograph dial adds interesting detail and complements the white hands, batons and date window for a monochrome finish.This Fossil watch has a smart and contemporary look that can be worn night or day to ensure you’re never late again.Useful info: Stainless steel linked braceletStainless steel bezelTachymeter frameDate windowChronograph dialWater resistant to 10 ATMFossil Chrono Bracelet Mens Watch.
